data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: This is further to our letter bearing Ref no. Ho-425-S dated August 10, 2021, wherein we had given an advance intimation of the upcoming Investor Conference Call organised by the Company on August 12, 2021 at 17:00 hours (IST) to discuss the financial performance of the Company of the quarter ended June 30, 2021. In terms of Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith a copy of Investor Presentation on the financial performance of the quarter ended June 30, 2021, which would be shared with the Investors.
